trans-unit.source: Provides a list of XAML nodes, which can be used for scenarios such as writing XAML nodes in a deferred manner.
trans-unit.target: 提供 XAML 節點，可用於案例，例如在延後的方式中撰寫 XAML 節點的清單。

trans-unit.source: When you create a XamlNodeList, you create a writer delegate that exists as the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeList.Writer%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 XamlNodeList 時，您會建立做為存在的寫入器委派<xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeList.Writer%2A>值。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeList.Writer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The writer delegate is based on an internal XAML writer class that is specifically for XAML nodes.
trans-unit.target: 寫入器委派根據內部的 XAML 寫入器類別，是專為 XAML 節點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeList"></xref> class, using a provided schema context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeList"></xref>類別，使用提供的結構描述內容。

trans-unit.source: The schema context is applied to the XAML writer that exists as the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeList.Writer%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述內容會套用至 XAML 寫入器的<xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeList.Writer%2A>值。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeList.Writer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The schema context to use for node operations.
trans-unit.target: 要用於節點作業的結構描述內容。

trans-unit.source: schemaContext is .
trans-unit.target: schemaContextis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeList"></xref> class, using a provided schema context and list size.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeList"></xref>類別，使用提供的結構描述內容和清單大小。

trans-unit.source: The schema context to use for node operations.
trans-unit.target: 要用於節點作業的結構描述內容。

trans-unit.source: The intended item count of the list.
trans-unit.target: 預期的項目清單的計數。

trans-unit.source: schemaContext is .
trans-unit.target: schemaContextis .

trans-unit.source: Clears the items in this list.
trans-unit.target: 清除此清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method calls `Clear` on the underlying list implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫`Clear`基礎清單實作上。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of nodes in this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在此取得的節點數目<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of nodes in this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在這個節點的數目<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a XAML reader implementation delegate.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 XAML 讀取器的實作委派。

trans-unit.source: Although it is not specifically a service provider, you can use the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader> delegate that is returned from GetReader in a service mode, where you cast it to <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlIndexingReader>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然不是特別為服務提供者，您可以使用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader>委派，會傳回從服務模式，其中您將它轉換為<xref:System.Xaml.IXamlIndexingReader>。</xref:System.Xaml.IXamlIndexingReader> GetReader</xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader>

trans-unit.source: In that mode you can get and set the index values for <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlIndexingReader.CurrentIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式下，您可以取得和設定<xref:System.Xaml.IXamlIndexingReader.CurrentIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Xaml.IXamlIndexingReader.CurrentIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的索引值

trans-unit.source: In this manner, the set mode enables skipping nodes without using the standard `Read` and `Skip`.
trans-unit.target: 這種方式，設定模式會啟用略過的節點而不使用標準`Read`和`Skip`。

trans-unit.source: A XAML reader implementation delegate.
trans-unit.target: XAML 讀取器的實作委派。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeList"></xref> is still in Write mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeList"> </xref>仍在寫入模式。

trans-unit.source: -or- The writer that is used for the node list has no schema context.
trans-unit.target: -或者-用於節點清單的寫入器有沒有結構描述內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the associated XAML writer.
trans-unit.target: 取得相關聯的 XAML 寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The associated XAML writer.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的 XAML 寫入器。
